Summary Note:
Carlotta Costanza Russo and the RM met at a networking event in Madrid. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Carlotta Costanza Russo is a 34 year old Program Manager from Spain.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, she chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Carlotta Costanza Russo has been happily married to Ferrari since 2021. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Carlotta received her secondary school diploma from Scuola Media Statale Giovanni Pascoli Napoli in 2009.
After that, she went on to study at Italian Institute of Industrial Automation (IAS) until 2015.
Occupation History:
Carlotta Costanza Russo is a seasoned professional with over 11 years of experience.
Carlotta Costanza Russo launched her career as a Aerospace Engineer at Alestis Aerospace S.L., where she gained valuable experience from 2014 to 2017.
She then transitioned to Indra Sistemas S.A. as a Program Manager, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 2019 till now.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 50000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She has townhouse located in Guadalajara, worth 857000 EUR.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns flat in Milan worth 692000 EUR.

On top of that she inherited a beautiful villa in Ancona, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 1850000 EUR.

Following the passing of her grandfather, a successful Real Estate Developer, she received an inheritance of 1620000 EUR in 2015, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
